___name.description: The name of the client (unique within an organization).

___orgname.description: The name of the organization the client is in.

___validator.description: Whether or not the client is a validator.

___public_key.description: The public key corresponding to the client's private key, for authentication.

___create_key.description: Tell the server whether to generate a default key for the new client or not (cannot be passed with public_key). If true, the server will return chef_key containing a private_key and public_key in its response body.
